SEARCH
Package com.hexaware.payxpert.dao

Class TaxDao

java.lang.Object
com.hexaware.payxpert.dao.TaxDao
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITaxDao
public class TaxDao extends Object implements ITaxDao
The TaxDao class provides methods for performing database operations related to tax records. It includes methods for retrieving tax records by ID, employee ID, and tax year.
Since:
2024-02-07
Version:
1.0
Author:
Praveen Kumar Kuruba
